name: Alex Bushmanov (relocation, remote, on-site)
summary: Experienced Frontend Developer with 8 years of expertise in JavaScript and modern frameworks like React, Angular, and Vue.js, collaborating effectively with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative solutions and staying up-to-date with industry trends.

experiences.position: Senior Software Engineer / Cross-Functional Product Expert
experiences.description: Space307 is a product-oriented IT company, whose flagship project is a trading platform for retail brokers. The platform currently has over 60 million users worldwide.
keyNotes: Developed AWS system with decentralized caching for 500,000 daily requests
Optimized code base, and removed JQuery, which helped to achieve 15% application size reduction
Established development processes, including review & approval flow and DoD/DoR documents, which 100% shortened backend/frontend tech difference
Rewrote frontend onboarding docs and created tutorials for internal tools
Authored articles to promote HR brand and improve colleagues' writing
Launched a news feed for senior frontend developers (1300+ subscribers) as part of DevRel
Implemented custom analytics solution by researching Amplitude performance
Developed product features, including fast chart API with FlatBuffers, market component rebuild, and new experience system integration

experiences.description: KMS Lighthouse is a knowledge management system used by businesses worldwide to create, store, share, and analyze information.
keyNotes: Implemented an AI-driven search engine in an existing KMS (Knowledge Management System) for enhanced product functionality
Managed a team of 5 members, including frontend, backend, and QA developers
Enhanced collaboration processes within teams and between development and business units

experiences.description: Distillery is an IT outsource company that specializes in custom software development, digital product design, and startup incubation for clients in various industries worldwide.
keyNotes: Migrated 3 customer websites from the US to new technology stacks
Led a team of 6 members working on these tasks (Frontend + Backend + QA + Project Manager)
Conducted numerous interviews for Middle/Senior Frontend Engineers in Russian and English for offices in Argentina, Mexico, and Russia
Worked as a guest specialist at one of Russia's largest banks, developing new features for their mobile website version
Improved and optimized functionality of the company's internal tools

experiences.description: EXEC LOGIC is a startup that develops a lightweight and efficient roof construction application to recommend materials and calculate the best material prices using advanced algorithms and data analytics.
keyNotes: Designed and developed a high-performance frontend application for roof construction using various materials
Utilized NodeJS expertise to replace the old backend and significantly reduce roof calculation time from 2 seconds to 50 milliseconds
Implemented advanced algorithms such as ray tracing in geometry to create multiple drawing and calculation modes, ahead of the mainstream adoption of these techniques
Enhanced the efficiency and cost-effectiveness of the roof building process by optimizing the application's performance and functionality

experiences.description: AdWatch Isobar is a digital advertising agency that provides services in strategy, design, media planning, and data analytics to clients in various industries worldwide.
keyNotes: Created numerous websites and landing pages for well-known companies such as Danone, Toffee, Nestle, Colgate-Palmolive, and others
Utilized HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to bring designs to life and ensure a responsive experience for users
Maintained a high level of quality control and attention to detail, delivering polished and professional final products
Collaborated with clients and team members to ensure projects were completed on time and to the satisfaction of all stakeholders.

experiences.description: Self-taught in programming, focusing on C++ and web development. Successfully completed freelance projects, including landing pages, with a long-term Moscow client.
keyNotes: Successful freelance experience, including a long-term Moscow client and various projects, mostly creating landing pages.
Self-taught in C++ and web development (HTML, CSS, JavaScript).
Committed to continuous learning and skill improvement in web development.
Diverse background in photography, journalism, and advertising.
